thread.title: Ground News - How Dave Myers learned to cook after heartbreaking diagnosis rocked family
thread.title_full: Ground News - How Dave Myers learned to cook after heartbreaking diagnosis rocked family

author: The Sun
title: Ground News - How Dave Myers learned to cook after heartbreaking diagnosis rocked family
text:
Summary by The Sun HAIRY Biker Si King today bid his TV sidekick Dave Myers an emotional farewell, telling him: “God’s speed brother.” The TV presenter posted a moving online tribute to his cooking co-star, who has succumbed to cancer aged 66. Dave’s death was announced by his co-star Si KingRex Dave never revealed which type of cancer he was suffering from Not known, clear with picture deskDave Myers’ wife Liliana shared a heartbreaking tribute to ‘her wonderful … Share menu 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
